channel.title: CVE Feed for SUSE -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SUSE -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-32188|2024-10-16T17:25:54.710Z -- suse -- neuvector
item.description: A user can reverse engineer the JWT token (JSON Web Token) used in authentication for Manager and API access, forging a valid NeuVector Token to perform malicious activity in NeuVector. This can lead to an RCE.

item.title: CVE-2023-32194|2024-10-16T17:25:32.070Z -- suse -- rancher
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified when granting a create or * global role for a resource type of "namespaces"; no matter the API group, the subject will receive * permissions for core namespaces. This can lead to someone being capable of accessing, creating, updating, or deleting a namespace in the project.

item.title: CVE-2023-32192|2024-10-16T17:25:48.514Z -- suse -- apiserver
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in which unauthenticated cross-site scripting (XSS) in the API Server's public API endpoint can be exploited, allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim browser

item.title: CVE-2023-22649|2024-10-16T17:26:00.938Z -- suse -- rancher
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified which may lead to sensitive data being leaked into Rancher's audit logs. [Rancher Audit Logging](https://ranchermanager.docs.rancher.com/how-to-guides/advanced-user-guides/enable-api-audit-log) is an opt-in feature, only deployments that have it enabled and have [AUDIT_LEVEL](https://ranchermanager.docs.rancher.com/how-to-guides/advanced-user-guides/enable-api-audit-log#audit-log-levels) set to `1 or above` are impacted by this issue.

item.title: CVE-2023-32191|2024-10-16T15:58:10.698Z -- suse -- rke
item.description: When RKE provisions a cluster, it stores the cluster state in a configmap called `full-cluster-state` inside the `kube-system` namespace of the cluster itself. The information available in there allows non-admin users to escalate to admin.

item.title: CVE-2024-22029|2024-10-16T13:20:47.698Z -- suse -- container%20suse%2Fmanager%2F5.0%2Fx86_64%2Fserver%3A5.0.0-beta1.2.122
item.description: Insecure permissions in the packaging of tomcat allow local users that win a race during package installation to escalate to root

item.title: CVE-2024-22030|2024-10-16T13:24:06.944Z -- suse -- rancher
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified within Rancher that can be exploited in narrow circumstances through a man-in-the-middle (MITM) attack. An attacker would need to have control of an expired domain or execute a DNS spoofing/hijacking attack against the domain to exploit this vulnerability. The targeted domain is the one used as the Rancher URL.

item.title: CVE-2023-32189|2024-10-16T13:48:39.236Z -- suse -- suse%20manager%20server%20module%204.3
item.description: Insecure handling of ssh keys used to bootstrap clients allows local attackers to potentially gain access to the keys

item.title: CVE-2024-22033|2024-10-16T13:42:46.559Z -- suse -- suse%20package%20hub%2015%20sp5
item.description: The OBS service obs-service-download_url was vulnerable to a command injection vulnerability. The attacker could provide a configuration to the service that allowed to execute command in later steps

item.title: CVE-2024-22032|2024-10-16T13:26:01.883Z -- suse -- rancher
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in which an RKE1 cluster keeps constantly reconciling when secrets encryption configuration is enabled. When reconciling, the Kube API secret values are written in plaintext on the AppliedSpec. Cluster owners, Cluster members, and Project members (for projects within the cluster), all have RBAC permissions to view the cluster object from the apiserver.

item.title: CVE-2024-22034|2024-10-16T13:46:08.416Z -- suse -- suse%20linux%20enterprise%20desktop%2015%20sp5
item.description: Attackers could put the special files in .osc into the actual package sources (e.g. _apiurl). This allows the attacker to change the configuration of osc for the victim

item.title: CVE-2023-22650|2024-10-16T08:20:42.467Z -- suse -- rancher
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in which Rancher does not automatically clean up a user which has been deleted from the configured authentication provider (AP). This characteristic also applies to disabled or revoked users, Rancher will not reflect these modifications which may leave the user’s tokens still usable.

item.title: CVE-2023-32188|2024-10-16T08:25:59.699Z -- suse -- neuvector
item.description: A user can reverse engineer the JWT token (JSON Web Token) used in authentication for Manager and API access, forging a valid NeuVector Token to perform malicious activity in NeuVector. This can lead to an RCE.

item.title: CVE-2023-22649|2024-10-16T07:59:26.608Z -- suse -- rancher
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified which may lead to sensitive data being leaked into Rancher's audit logs. [Rancher Audit Logging](https://ranchermanager.docs.rancher.com/how-to-guides/advanced-user-guides/enable-api-audit-log) is an opt-in feature, only deployments that have it enabled and have [AUDIT_LEVEL](https://ranchermanager.docs.rancher.com/how-to-guides/advanced-user-guides/enable-api-audit-log#audit-log-levels) set to `1 or above` are impacted by this issue.

item.title: CVE-2023-22649|2024-10-16T07:46:50.610Z -- suse -- rancher
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified which may lead to sensitive data being leaked into Rancher's audit logs. [Rancher Audit Logging](https://ranchermanager.docs.rancher.com/how-to-guides/advanced-user-guides/enable-api-audit-log) is an opt-in feature, only deployments that have it enabled and have [AUDIT_LEVEL](https://ranchermanager.docs.rancher.com/how-to-guides/advanced-user-guides/enable-api-audit-log#audit-log-levels) set to `1 or above` are impacted by this issue.

item.title: CVE-2023-32190|2024-10-16T12:03:05.078Z -- suse -- opensuse%20tumbleweed
item.description: mlocate's %post script allows RUN_UPDATEDB_AS user to make arbitrary files world readable by abusing insecure file operations that run with root privileges.

item.title: CVE-2023-32193|2024-10-16T12:27:13.591Z -- suse -- norman
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in which unauthenticated cross-site scripting (XSS) in Norman's public API endpoint can be exploited. This can lead to an attacker exploiting the vulnerability to trigger JavaScript code and execute commands remotely.

item.title: CVE-2023-32191|2024-10-16T12:17:02.324Z -- suse -- rke
item.description: When RKE provisions a cluster, it stores the cluster state in a configmap called `full-cluster-state` inside the `kube-system` namespace of the cluster itself. The information available in there allows non-admin users to escalate to admin.

item.title: CVE-2023-32192|2024-10-16T12:23:17.271Z -- suse -- apiserver
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in which unauthenticated cross-site scripting (XSS) in the API Server's public API endpoint can be exploited, allowing an attacker to execute arbitrary JavaScript code in the victim browser

item.title: CVE-2023-32196|2024-10-16T13:01:47.230Z -- suse -- rancher
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified whereby privilege escalation checks are not properly enforced for RoleTemplateobjects when external=true, which in specific scenarios can lead to privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2023-32194|2024-10-16T12:56:37.617Z -- suse -- rancher
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified when granting a create or * global role for a resource type of "namespaces"; no matter the API group, the subject will receive * permissions for core namespaces. This can lead to someone being capable of accessing, creating, updating, or deleting a namespace in the project.

item.description: Attackers could put the special files in .osc into the actual package sources (e.g. _apiurl). This allows the attacker to change the configuration of osc for the victim

item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in which an RKE1 cluster keeps constantly reconciling when secrets encryption configuration is enabled. When reconciling, the Kube API secret values are written in plaintext on the AppliedSpec. Cluster owners, Cluster members, and Project members (for projects within the cluster), all have RBAC permissions to view the cluster object from the apiserver.

item.description: The OBS service obs-service-download_url was vulnerable to a command injection vulnerability. The attacker could provide a configuration to the service that allowed to execute command in later steps

This characteristic also applies to disabled or revoked users, Rancher will not reflect these modifications which may leave the user’s tokens still usable.

item.description: mlocate's %post script allows RUN_UPDATEDB_AS user to make arbitrary files world readable by abusing insecure file operations that run with root privileges.
